name: Banjo's Arcade: notavirus.exe
description:
Take control of a computer virus ripping up a filesystem. Collect 9 different types of powerup, and reflect and spin your virus ball to destroy files, folders, and archives without falling into the firewall. For fans of Arkanoid.

Please note: when I tried playing this on a different PC, Windows Defender incorrectly flagged it as a potential trojan. I promise this is a simple GameMaker compiled executable that has no malicious behaviours, despite the scary name/theme. You may ignore any false positive warnings, and play this game safely. Further scans of the files included returned no issues. Thank you. -banjo
